Flow.description: Screen flow to create Retrocession agreements from a parent agreement BBH 19.08.24 : W-2100 - CLM - Amendment for 1 unique retro following an acceptation amendment
Flow.label: CLM - Retrocession - create agreements

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ErrDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Retrocession agreements have already been generated for this agreement 👀

You will find them in the "🔂 Retrocession" tab below

fields.name: ErrDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Oops.. an error occurred 😟


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

{!ErrMsg}


Try to click on the Refresh button or try again in a few minutes.


If the error persist please contact your administrator

fields.name: HelpTextScreen2
fields.fieldText:
💡Below is the retrocession agreements that will be generated.

If everything seems right, click Next

textTemplates.name: sheetRule
textTemplates.text:
⏳In order of rule execution:

  1. If agreement is an amendment ➡ 📄 {to_be_completed}
  2. If agreement is of type "Group cover" ➡ 📄 Retrocession template group cover
  3. If treaty type is XL or SL AND Loss Deposit (In Signing Request) = Yes ➡ 📄 Retrocession template - Life Non propor-Proportional Retroc with deposit
  4. If treaty type is XL or SL AND Loss Deposit (In Signing Request) = No ➡ 📄 Retrocession template - Life Non propor-Proportional Retroc without deposit
  5. If treaty type is QS or Surplus AND Loss Deposit (In Signing Request) = Yes ➡ 📄 Retrocession template - P&C Propor Retro with deposit
  6. If treaty type is QS or Surplus AND Loss Deposit (In Signing Request) = Yes ➡📄 Retrocession template - P&C Propor Retro without deposit
